abstract: An option that indicates that the session periodically provides user instructions.
overview:
## Discussion

When you enable this option and the framework determines the device needs a particular movement or perspective, it calls your delegate’s [doc://com.apple.RoomPlan/documentation/RoomPlan/RoomCaptureSessionDelegate/captureSession(_:didProvide:)] and provides a particular [doc://com.apple.RoomPlan/documentation/RoomPlan/RoomCaptureSession/Instruction] that you can display to the user.

The default value is `true`.

# isCoachingEnabled

**Instance Property**

An option that indicates that the session periodically provides user instructions.

## Declaration

```swift
var isCoachingEnabled: Bool
```

## Discussion

When you enable this option and the framework determines the device needs a particular movement or perspective, it calls your delegate’s [doc://com.apple.RoomPlan/documentation/RoomPlan/RoomCaptureSessionDelegate/captureSession(_:didProvide:)] and provides a particular [doc://com.apple.RoomPlan/documentation/RoomPlan/RoomCaptureSession/Instruction] that you can display to the user.

The default value is `true`.
title: isCoachingEnabled
